text:
Hotel Aston Kartika grogol merupakan salah satu hotel yg masuk wish list keluarga kecil kami sejak awal kenal HRI 1th yang lalu, selain kolam renang yg ramah anak, kolam renang yg semi outdoor, gedung yg mewah (versi saya), akses yg gampang karena lokasi yg strategis.

Akhirnya pas epic Oktober 2022 Aston Kartika grogol menjadi inceran pertama dan pilih tgl pas istri ulang tahun, namun Krn istri ulang tahun di tgl 1 Januari harga - harga hotel lumayan tinggi akhirnya di geser ke weekend berikutnya di tgl 8 Januari dan Alhamdulillah rezeki dapet harga ndlosor.

Dpt harga 160k room only (segini juga sudah happy). Awalnya rencana nginep di Aston Kartika grogol sempet maju mundur karena kondisi istri yang lagi hamil 2bln dan punya riwayat lemah kandungan. Karena saya harus over time dulu dan pulang jam 12:00 akhirnya berangkat dari Bekasi sekitar jam  14:00 dan sampai hotel jam 15:30.
Sampai di hotel langsung di sambut pak satpam yang sigap bantuin kita nurunin barang, Lobby yang luas namun kurang banyak spot buat photo2. Karena lobby lumayan sepi cekin pun cepat tidak sampai 5 menit langsung dapat kunci.

Pas cekin di info dpt kamar lantai 11 dan type kamar type studio sesuai pesanan saya di trave*loka, sempet nego siapa tau bisa dapat di lantai lebih tinggi (karena request high floor) tapi gak di acc akhirnya pasrah aja. namun tiba-tiba pas nyerahin kunci kamar, mas Nanang (sebagai FO) bilang *type kamar di upgrade ke type studio plus dan dapat di lantai 20* (Alhamdulillah langsung speachless) 😁, entahlah apa yg jadi bahan pertimbangannya, entah karena pasang muka pikarunyaeun.

Request view mall central park (di kabulkan) meskipun setengahnya lg view tembok gedung universitas Trisakti, padahal expectasinya full view central park dan jalanan tol kirain gak ada gedung-gedung Trisakti dan Untar 😁

Request free slice cake *happy birthday* (di kabulkan). Dan di tawarin buat di kirim jam brp (akhirnya saya pilih jam 20:00).
Sebelumnya istri sudah sedikit ngedumel karena pas masuk kamar gak ada slice cake namun pas jam 20:00 malam dia suprise banget ketika di kirim slice cakenya tanpa dia duga.

Kolam renang ada dilantai 3 dan disampingnya tempat meroko, gym dengan peralatan yang cukup lengkap, juga ada ballroom buat acara wedding atau yang lainnya. selain kolam renang dewasa disini juga ada kolam renang anak dengan kedalaman kurang lebih 40cm yang lumayan luas.

Lift yang ada di Aston Kartika grogol ada 4 sehingga gak ada penumpukan antrian untuk naik ataupun turun, akses untuk penggunaan lift kita harus tap kartu yang sudah di setting sesuai lantai kamar kita.
Kamar cukup luas dan fasilitas lainnya standar hotel bintang 4 juga lengkap.
Amenitis lengkap, handuk bersih, untuk minumnya di sediakan dispenser di lorong hotel untuk isi ulang, namun sampah-sampah kecil masih ada yang berserakan di bawah kasur (tapi bagi kami tidak begitu mengganggu).

Terimakasih Aston Kartika grogol, meskipun dpt harga promoan tp Service  nya jossss.

Kalau di tanya mau kesini lg gak, mau dong sekalian ajak orang tua plus nyobain breakfast nya heheh

text: Booking kamar superior with breakfast 1 malam di hotel ini. Proses check in cepat staff ramah dan tanggap. Saya di upgrade ke kamar deluxe (smoking room) di lt.8 tanpa charge tambahan. Kamar luas dan bersih, pemandangan dari dalam kamar bagus. Swimming pool luas, pada saat saya menginap tidak banyak yg berenang jdi puas sprti kolam renang pribadi. Hotel ini menerapkan standar go green jadi tidak menyediakan air mineral kemasan, dan digantikan dengan teko kaca yg bisa kita isi ulang sendiri dispenser disediakan dilorong kamar. Ini suatu kemajuan yg tdk pernah saya temukan di hotel lain. Untuk perlengkapan mandi sprti sikat gigi juga dibuat dari bahan kayu. Untuk breakfast menu yg disediakan amat sangat beragam, mulai dari makanan berat seperti nasi, kwetiau, spagetti, ayam, ikan, sayur, dan sosis. Ada lagi stall bubur ayam, lontong sayur, bubur manis, soto daging, omelete, aneka pastry, aneka roti, aneka salad, aneka cake, aneka snack, buah potong, aneka jus (ada lebih dari 2 pilihan jus), jamu, kopi dan teh. Makanan yg di sajikan pun rasanya enak. Staff hotel sangat ramah mulai dari proses check in sampai check out saya di layani dengan sangat profesional ramah dan cekatan. Setiap bertemu tamu para staff hotel selalu menyapa. Saya sempat kehilangan kunci kendaraan setelah check out, dan saya kembali ke receptionist untuk mengecek kembali kamar saya apakah ada kunci kendaraan yang tertinggal. Mereka langsung menghubungi housekeeping untuk membantu mengecek ulang dan mengizinkan saya untuk mengecek sendiri ke kamar didampingi dgn housekeeping. Terima kasih aston kartika grogol. Next time saya pasti akan menginap lagi disana.
title: Happy holiday

text:

Pelayanan dari karyawan hotel yang ramah dan sangat helpfull. Welldone. Kami merasa sangat puas atas jasa pelayanan di Aston Kartika. Selanjutnya, membahas fasilitas di hotel ini yg sangat lengkap. Semua fasilitas dijaga selalu bersih dan diawasi oleh petugas. Menuju lantai 23 untuk mendapatkan free breaksfast dan tea time snack. Aneka menu yg disiapkan oleh cheff hotel sangat special. Rasa bintang lima yg sesungguhnya. 
Kamar deluxe hotel dgn interior yg modern elegant dan walk in closset yg very clean. Suit room hotel terdiri atas sittingroom dan bedroom yg dibatasi oleh devider tv, walk in closset lebih private krn dibatasi oleh sliding door yg compact.

text: Area Lobi luas dan interiornya cukup bagus, saya suka ceiling-nya yg tinggi sehingga terlihat megah dengan hiasan lampu kristal. Proses check in lumayan cepat dan tidak ada masalah. Untuk kamar tempat saya menginap (Deluxe) lumayan luas, saya suka kamar mandinya yg lega dan rain showernya, semua peralatan dan perlengkapan berfungsi dengan baik. Sore harinya saya makan di restoran Asoka di lantai 23, awalnya saya pikir konsep restorannya ada ruangan indoor & outdoor (karena ada kata "rooftop"), tapi ternyata hanya indoor saja. Pelayanan staff di restoran sangat baik, kualitas dan rasa makanan cukup baik dan mungkin bisa ditingkatkan lagi. Esok paginya saya sarapan di restoran yang sama, saya lihat masih ada beberapa karyawan training, mereka belum bisa bekerja secara profesional dan mengutamakan kenyamanan tamu, contohnya ketika meletakan piring kotor di tray, mereka meletakannya dengan tidak perlahan sehingga menimbulkan suara piring terbentur yang agak kencang. Untuk kualitas hidangan sarapan ada beberapa yang penyajiannya tidak maksimal (dingin & kering), mohon untuk diperhatikan lagi. Area swimming pool kurang luas dan layoutnya mungkin bisa diubah agar lebih nyaman apabila banyak tamu yg berkunjung kesana. Proses checkout agak lama karena saya diminta menunggu sementara house keeping mengecek kamar saya, namun kemudian saya tidak dikabari apakah pengecekannya sudah selesai dan semuanya ok sehingga saya bisa pergi. Akhirnya setelah menunggu agak lama saya menanyakan ke resepsionis dan baru diinfokan bahwa semuanya sudah ok. Mohon hal seperti ini diperhatikan dan kenyamanan tamu selalu diprioritaskan agar tidak kelamaan menunggu. Overall Hotel ini cukup baik dan saya harap terus melakukan peningkatan dalam segala hal, khususnya dari kualitas pelayanan tamu, terima kasih.
title: Hotel baru yang masih perlu improvement

text: If you want the best service and great value you have to visit this hotel.The rooms are spotless,the beds are so comfy,the pillows are so soft the buffet breakfast is huge and many choices.But most of all the staff are very professional and nothing is too much trouble for them.They have a large swimming pool and a gym.The hotel is located not far from the airport about a 20 minute drive.The hotel General Manager is Mr Pak Bambang.His attention to detail is amazing and he makes everyone feel comfortable inside his hotel.I want to say a huge thank you to Pak Bambang and also all the fantastic staff that make your stay like a home away from home.Experience this Hotel for yourself and im sure you wont regret it.The photo below is the GM Pak Bambang and his band playing the guitar,at the poolside bbq area.
title: Best hotel in Jakarta,value for money.

text:
ASTON Kartika Grogol Hotel & Conference Center
Jl. Kyai Tapa No.101, RT.6/RW.16, Tomang, Kec. Grogol petamburan, Kota Jakarta Barat, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 11440
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This hotel has 25th floors with the following explanation:

- Total Rooms: 188 Rooms (67 Superior Rooms with 27sqm, 96 Deluxe Rooms with 27sqm, 25 Suite Rooms with 54sqm & 1 President Suite Room with 108sqm)
- L floor there is a Receptionist

- 3rd Floor there is a Swimming Pool, Fitness Center and Rasamala Grand Ballroom

- 5th Floor there is some Anyelir & Edelweiss Meeting Room
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
According to our experience while staying at this hotel are:

*First, We have to get through metal detectors, x ray machines and health protocols in the form of checking body temperature. When we entered the lobby of the hotel, we felt the hotel was very clean and comfortable. 

*Second, when checking in the receptionist service is very friendly and provides quite detailed information. Then requesting an identity card and fill registration form with health declaration.

*Third, for the hotel room itself is very clean and feels comfortable. Of course with supporting facilities such as air conditioner, television, telephone, electric kettle and High Speed WiFi that can be accessed. Then for the bathroom it is also very clean, with complete toiletries such as bath & Shower Gel, Conditioning Shampoo placed near the shower, Hand Soap, Shower Cap and Dental Kit placed at washbowl also provide a Hair Dryer.

*Fourth, unfortunately that during the pandemic the hotel restaurant was not opened for breakfast. But in return the hotel prepares breakfast near Swimming Pool. The breakfast menu is quite varied but not so complete compared to breakfast at Asoka Restaurant before the pandemic.

*Fifth, very strategic location of the hotel becomes an additional value for this hotel. Such as the famous four malls in the West Jakarta area, Taman Anggrek Mall, Central Park Mall, Neo Soho & Ciputra Mall Jakarta. And also the most complete cellphone sales center in Jakarta, namely ITC Roxy Mas
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

text:
TLDR: new hotel, good accessibility, highly recommended for business trips/short stays. Great staff. Excellent rates outside peak seasons. 

We stayed from 23/12 until 9/1 at the Aston Grogol. This is a new hotel in a very tall tower in West Jakarta, strategically located near major roads and tollways. Taxis (Blue Bird) are always available. We have extended our stay twice due to the Jakarta floods. While the rate was inflated due to New Year's, we were at least happy they were able to accommodate us. Note that their usual rates are actually quite cheap. 

We stayed at the 2nd tier room, the Deluxe room. These are nice, modern rooms with all the amenities one would expect. The linens were not always 100% clean, as the hotel adheres to environmental concerns. But if you ask to change, new linens are spotless. As an other environmental measure - bottled water is not provided. Instead, there are two water dispensers in the hall. A water cooker and complimentary tea and coffee are present, though. We stayed at the eighth floor. Traffic was a bit noisy, with motorbikes in particular being quite audible. Bring earplugs. 

Breakfast was served on one of the top floors, on the 23rd. Times are 06:00-10:00, which is standard for business travelers but for leisure it's a bit of a rush to get in in time. Staff start clearing the dishes at 10:00 sharp, but will notify guests 10 minutes beforehand. Since the hotel seems to be booked quite well, breakfast is quite busy. The available seating is on the tight side. Food is plentiful though, with quick refilling and varied items on the menu: from Indonesian food to sushi, pastries, pizza and egg and rice porridge stands. Outside of breakfast, the 23rd floor doubles as a restaurant. We had lunch and dinner a couple of times. Although service can be slow (especially if you're coming in larger groups), the food was good and not too-highly priced. Room service is also available, and this is fast and quite cheap actually. 

Other amenities are the pool and gym on the third floor. I tried the gym, it was nice to get a bit of workout done. 

Laundry service is available, and although the result is very clean and they fold/hang it incredibly neatly (with clips and cardboard collars and everything), it is quite expensive. 

A final note is for the very friendly and helpful staff. Special shoutout to pak Faldy, ibu Eris, ibu Ina, ibu Lisdi and pak Irul. They are hardworking people and have a good sense of professionalism. An example of this is when pak Faldy (who is responsible for the food services) held an order of chicken soup because it didn't taste well. Usually the customer has to report this, I felt very taken care of when he mentioned he did. I can only wish him and all his colleagues all the best in the future in this new hotel.
title: New Gem

text:
I stayed at Aston Kartika Grogol for 8 nights. To me, it was a very pleasant and memorable stay since my family and i spent most of our time just chilling in the hotel. The room was clean and well-lit. Room service was also excellent. Not to mention i went back to my room to see that my towels were shaped to flower and got a special note from my room attendant, Mr. Ridho, twice. 

Also, the breakfast provided is never boring. They really got it all. Pizza, doughnuts, pastries, sushi rolls, salad, egg station, pancake and waffle station, and a whole set of both Western and Indonesian food. They also provided a wide range of drinks. They even have jamu, which is quite rare nowadays. It’s nice how visitors get to know the classic Indonesian cuisine just through their breakfast at Aston Kartika. Special mention to the restaurant’s supervisor, Mr. Faldy who’s always ready to help us during breakfast and greets everyone he met. Overall it was such a great experience
title: The staffs were very friendly

text: So eager to review this hotel. Quite fast check in, easy to locate, get a suite room on 22nd floor. My only disappointment is the black out at night, apparently there's some technical problems with the electricity because of the never ending rain during new year's eve. My conclusion for this hotel is a great hotel with nice and clean room perfect for staycation or business occasion and in my experiences with aston are always in happy ending. My suggestions are look for high floor for the best view, suite rooms are the best selection, and for the hotel keep the good work and maybe for emergency such as black out to give information to the customer before will be great, and please improve the wifi connection

I love the variety of breakfast foods, although there are many choices I can find my favorite foods that are bread, sausage, and lime juice. Thank you for the waitress (sorry I forgot the name) who remember my order for lime juice within 3 days I stayed here. The Ballroom is really high, wide, big and huge, I think it`s a perfect place to hold an International and National Meeting up to wedding reception in Jakarta. Totally recommended for the business traveler, we can do business and culinary in this hotel area too.

text:
Hospitality industry doesn't only excel in terms of infrastructure bitnindeed it is the services which make a property distinct from others 
Pros 
Newly built property and just opened a month ago and that's why they are offering a good discount. Comfortable rooms with all the basic amenities in very good condition. Rooms as well as washrooms are neat,clean and tidy.
Breakfast is really extremely good in terms of quality and spread and I would recommend that one shouldn't miss it. Mid size pool is also there along with a kids book of 60 CM depth at 3rd floor. Still some renovation work is in progress across various floors. Staff is greeting particularly restaurant staff

Cons. 
Not too many as they are new but something is wrong with training of staff. For two consecutive days my rooms was not cleaned till 3.30 pm despite of calling to housekeeping team. I complained at reception and to my surprise they answer that they only make those rooms where request is placed. This was a shocking answer to me as everywhere is the world rooms in hotel are cleaned in daily basis. 
OK then I said so please don't send anyone to clean my room as already it was half an hour I requested to housekeeping team and the guy at reception said OK thanks sir.  
Now they are enjoying super traffic just because Of new property and lower torrid but with this behavior I don't think that they will survive longer. 
I hope there is a management also who could think better to serve guests. I am coming to this hotel again for a week on 14th again, see how the things will go
title: Excellent new property but untrained staff except restaurant

text:
This is a great hotel and I enjoyed staying at this beautiful hotel and I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a great experience.
It is close to the most beautiful malls such as Central Park, Taman Anggrek Mall and Neo Soho Mall making it a special hotel for the family itself and for everyone as well ..
title: A great hotel in everything

text:
空港至近のホテル数軒に泊まった際、渋滞にあうと空港から到着するまでにかなり時間がかかることがあったので、少し距離を広げて探し、有料道路付近のこちらを予約しました。（宿泊したのは2020年1月半ばです。）

◎空港からの快適アクセス◎
有料道路を通ってのアクセスはとてもスムーズで快適。時間もあまりかかりませんでした。

◎コスパのいいスイートルーム◎
お手頃価格帯。とても広い。床から天井まである窓からの眺めが素晴らしい。お手洗いがバスルームから独立した個室。（２泊目に気がついたのですが）チョコやジュース等のミニバーが無料。眺めのいいExecutiveラウンジで、フィンガーフード等いただくことも出来ました。

◎その他◎
・朝食会場からの眺めも素晴らしく、内容も充実していて美味しかったです。
・スタッフの皆さんの対応がとても良かったです。。
・プールエリアに屋根があり、暑い日差しを避けて泳ぐことが出来ました。
・一点だけ気になったのは、壁が厚くないのか？、隣のお部屋からの音がかなり聞こえてしまっていたことです。。。（チェックインの際、隣りが空いているお部屋を頼んでみるのもいいかもしれません。）
title: 空港からのアクセスも良く、スイートルームのコスパもいい。
